topics.title: Attribute Examples
topics.string:
Set a Character's Life Value - To a Random Number
---

    {key=player_life, name=Life, type=attribute, output=[rand:8|18], tags=stats|life }

---


Set a Character's Stats - To a Random Number
---

    {key=player_strength, name=Strength, type=attribute, output=[rand:7|20], tags=stats }

---


Track Which Weapon a Character Has Armed
---

    {key=player_armed, name=Armed Weapon, type=attribute, output=, tags=armed|stats }

---
